content: Once the restoring process is over, you'll be automatically redirected to your {{productName}}.

comment.text: The PreparationPortalDescription translation key is used to display a message that will be shown after the restoring process is complete, informing users that they will be automatically redirected to their product name. This text appears in the UI on a screen where a progress indicator and percentage are displayed, likely on a preparation portal page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The passive voice 'usted será redirigido' is somewhat stiff and less common in modern Spanish. A more natural phrasing would be using an active voice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Una vez terminado el proceso de restauración, te redirigiremos a tu {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Siinä vaiheessa kun" is a somewhat verbose and unnatural way to say "Once" in this context. A more natural translation would be something like "Kun" or "Heti kun".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kun palautuksen prosessi on ohi, sinut siirretään automaattisesti {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation uses 'est terminé' which is grammatically incorrect in this context. It should be 'est terminée' to agree with 'processus' (masculine).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Une fois le processus de restauration est terminée, vous serez automatiquement redirigé vers votre {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "redirected" is not ideal. "리디렉션됩니다" is a direct transliteration of 'redirect' and might not be the most natural way to express the idea in Korean. A more common and natural phrasing would be "이동됩니다" or "넘어갑니다".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 복원 과정이 끝나면 포털로 자동으로 {{productName}}로 이동됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence uses the masculine form 'przekierowany'. Assuming the user can be male or female, it should be gender-neutral.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po zakończeniu procesu przywracania zostaniesz automatycznie przekierowany/a do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Uma vez que' can sound slightly formal or clunky in this context. While grammatically correct, a more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Assim que o processo de restauração terminar, você será automaticamente redirecionado para o {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණ' is a complex term. While it's generally understood as 'restoration', a more common and accessible term in this context might be 'නැවත සකස් කිරීම' or 'අලුත්වැඩියාව'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණ' with 'නැවත සකස් කිරීම' or 'අලුත්වැඩියාව' for improved clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the sentence structure is technically correct, it might sound a little formal for a user-facing message. A slightly more conversational tone could be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to something like: 'ඔබගේ {{productName}} වෙත යවා දීමට, ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණ ක්‍රියාවලිය අවසානයේ ඔබව ස්වයංක්‍රීයව යවා දමනු ඇත.' (After the restoring process is complete, you will automatically be redirected to your {{productName}}.)
